title: FS: A few higher end T206 BVG graded
author: BlueDevil89

posts.post_title: FS: A few higher end T206 BVG graded
posts.post_content:
Prices include insured shipping with Delivery Confirmation.   PayPal, Google Checkout, and USPS Money Orders accepted.

Wilbur Goode (Sweet Caporal)    BVG 7 NM      $295
George Moriarty (Piedmont)        BVG 7 NM      $295
Dolly Gray (Piedmont)                BVG 6 EX-MT $195
Jimmy Williams (Sweet Caporal)  BVG 5.5 EX+ $160

Slabbed in the Beckett BVG holders designed to keep cards safe through the apocalypse.   [Sorry for the glare from the scans of the thick BVG holders.]
